posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start沐汐的博客1Hello 抹茶 1$ hexo new "My New Post" 好像是一个群: ACG樱桃iApp Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: text
posts.text: Quick Start沐汐的博客1234 123456789spring: application: name: consul-comsumer cloud: consul: host: 127.0.0.1 port: 8500 discovery: register: true # 默认就是true, consumer可以不注册的也可设为false 1Hello 抹茶 1$ hexo new "My New Post" 好像是一个群: ACG樱桃iApp Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy

posts.title: 测试文章
posts.text: 测试代码高亮：1 123456789spring: application: name: consul-comsumer cloud: consul: host: 127.0.0.1 port: 8500+ discovery:- register: true # 默认就是true, consumer可以不注册的也可设为false 2 123456789public void swap(int[] a, int indexI, int indexJ) { if (a == null || indexI >= a.length || indexJ >= a.length) { System.out.println("a is null ,index out of bound"); return; } int tmp = a[indexI]; a[indexI] = a[indexJ]; a[indexJ] = tmp;} 12343 1234567spring: application: name: consul-provider cloud: consul: host: 127.0.0.1 port: 8500 4 123456@GetMapping("restTemplateInvoke")public ResponseEntity<String> restTemplateInvoke(@RequestParam String name) { String url = "http://consul-provider/getHello?name=" + name; String result = this.restTemplate.getForObject(url, String.class); return new ResponseEntity(result, HttpStatus.OK);} 5 1234@GetMapping("/actuator/health")public String health() { return "OK";}
